description: Retention of Group House as B1 office use with retained car and cycle spaces at basement and ground floor levels; Conversion of UCB House into fifty two 1 - bedroomed, twenty 2 - bedroomed and three 3 - bedroomed self contained flats involving infilling of first floor rear, new entrance lobby at first floor front, use of existing balcony/terrace areas as private amenity space and provision of 30 photovoltaic panels to roof together with car, cycle and motor cycle parking at basement and ground floor levels and new external refuse store.
